AT.name: Bloo Kid 2
AT.description: Bloo Kid 2 ist ein klassisches 2D Jump and Run im Retro-Style, mit liebevoll gepixelter Grafik und einem bombastischen Chiptune-Soundtrack. Renne, Springe und Schwimme durch FÜNF riesige Welten mit jeweils neun Levels. Überstehe brutale Bosskämpfe und entdecke zahllose Secrets in der Welt von Bloo Kid 2. Nachdem er seine Freundin aus den Klauen des Bösen Zauberers befreit hat, genießen Bloo Kid und Pink Girl zusammen mit Ihrem Neugeborenen "Pink Kid" ihr Leben. Doch plötzlich beginnt völlig unerwartet ein neues Abenteuer... Bloo Kid 2 bietet: - fünf Welten mit jeweils neun Levels - echte Pixel-Handarbeit - einen fetten Chiptune-Soundtrack - epische Bosskämpfe - tonnenweise Secrets

AU.name: Bloo Kid 2
AU.description: Bloo Kid 2 is a classic 2D retro-style platformer experience with lovely designed pixel-graphics and a full chiptune soundtrack. Run, jump and swim your way through FIVE huge worlds with nine levels each. Master brutal bossfights and discover lots of secrets in the world of Bloo Kid 2. After rescuing his girlfriend from the hands of the evil wizard, Bloo Kid and Pink Girl enjoy life with their newborn "Pink Kid". But then, a whole new adventure starts just out of the bloo... Bloo Kid 2 features - five worlds with nine levels each - handcrafted, colorful pixel-graphics - a full chiptune soundtrack - epic boss battles - tons of secrets

BE.name: Bloo Kid 2
BE.description: Bloo Kid 2 est une expérience de jeu de plateforme style classique 2D rétro avec de magnifiques animations graphiques en plus d'une bande-sonore chiptune complète. Courrez, sautez et nagez à travers cinq mondes énormes de neuf niveaux chacun. Maîtriser les bossfights sans merci et découvrez de nombreux dans le monde de Bloo Kid 2. Après avoir sauvé sa petite amie des mains du sorcier maléfique, Bloo Kid et Pink Girl profitent de la vie avec leur nouveau-né "Kid rose". Mais une nouvelle aventure commence alors, une aventure "é-bloo-uissante"... Les caractéristiques de Bloo Kid 2: -cinq mondes avec neuf niveaux chacun -pixel-graphiques faits et colorés à la main -une bande-sonore chiptune complèt -d'épiques combats contre les boss -des tonnes de secrets

ES.name: Bloo Kid 2
ES.description: Bloo Kid 2 es un clásico juego de plataforma 2D de estilo retro con gráficas de diseño pixelado y banda sonora de chiptunes completa. Corre, salta y nada a través de CINCO mundos enormes y nueve niveles en cada uno. Domina brutales batallas contra jefes y descubre muchos secretos en el mundo de Bloo Kid 2. Bloo Kid 2 is a classic 2D retro-style platformer experience with lovely designed pixel-graphics and a full chiptune soundtrack. Run, jump and swim your way through FIVE huge worlds with nine levels each. Master brutal bossfights and discover lots of secrets in the world of Bloo Kid 2. After rescuing his girlfriend from the hands of the evil wizard, Bloo Kid and Pink Girl enjoy life with their newborn "Pink Kid". But then, a whole new adventure starts just out of the bloo... Bloo Kid 2 features - five worlds with nine levels each - handcrafted, colorful pixel-graphics - a full chiptune soundtrack - epic boss battles - tons of secrets Después de rescatar a su novia de las manos del mago malévolo, Bloo Kid y Pink Girl disfrutan la vida con su recién nacido "Pink Kid". Pero entonces, de la nada comienza una nueva aventura... Bloo Kid 2 destaca: - cinco mundos con nueve niveles en cada uno - gráficas pixeleadas coloridas hechas a mano - una banda sonora de chiptunes completa - épicas batallas de jefes - toneladas de secretos

IT.name: Bloo Kid 2
IT.description: Bloo Kid 2 è un videogioco a piattaforme classico 2D vecchio stile con un una grafica raster incantevole e una colonna sonora completa in chiptune. Corri, salta e nuota facendoti strada tra CINQUE enormi mondi con nove livelli ognuno. Diventa esperto in combattimenti brutali con i boss e scopri i molti segreti del mondo di Bloo Kid 2. Caratteristiche di Bloo Kid 2: - cinque mondi con nove livelli ognuno - grafica raster colorata e fatta a mano - una colonna sonora in chiptune completa - battaglie epiche con i boss - tonnellate di segreti

NL.name: Bloo Kid 2
NL.description: Bloo Kid 2 is een klassieke 2D retro platformervaring met prachtig ontworpen pixel-graphics en een volledige chiptune soundtrack. Ren, spring en zwem door VIJF enorme werelden met elk negen levels. Beheers enorme gevechten met eindbazen en ontdek alle geheimen van de wereld van Bloo Kid 2. Na het redden van zijn vriendin uit de handen van een kwade tovenaar, geniet Bloo Kid met Pink Girl van het leven en hun kleine Pink Kid. Maar dan start een heel nieuw avontuur zo uit het niets... Bloo Kid 2 heeft: - vijf werelden met elk negen levels - met de hand ontworpen kleurige pixel-graphics - een volledige chiptune soundtrack - epische bazengevechten - bergen geheimen

NZ.name: Bloo Kid 2
NZ.description: Bloo Kid 2 is a classic 2D retro-style platformer experience with lovely designed pixel-graphics and a full chiptune soundtrack. Run, jump and swim your way through FIVE huge worlds with nine levels each. Master brutal bossfights and discover lots of secrets in the world of Bloo Kid 2. After rescuing his girlfriend from the hands of the evil wizard, Bloo Kid and Pink Girl enjoy life with their newborn "Pink Kid". But then, a whole new adventure starts just out of the bloo... Bloo Kid 2 features - five worlds with nine levels each - handcrafted, colorful pixel-graphics - a full chiptune soundtrack - epic boss battles - tons of secrets

PL.name: Bloo Kid 2
PL.description: Bloo Kid 2 is a classic 2D retro-style platformer experience with lovely designed pixel-graphics and a full chiptune soundtrack. Run, jump and swim your way through FIVE huge worlds with nine levels each. Master brutal bossfights and discover lots of secrets in the world of Bloo Kid 2. After rescuing his girlfriend from the hands of the evil wizard, Bloo Kid and Pink Girl enjoy life with their newborn "Pink Kid". But then, a whole new adventure starts just out of the bloo... Bloo Kid 2 features - five worlds with nine levels each - handcrafted, colorful pixel-graphics - a full chiptune soundtrack - epic boss battles - tons of secrets

PT.name: Bloo Kid 2
PT.description: Bloo Kid 2 oferece uma experiência de plataformas estilo retro em 2D clássico com gráficos em píxels desenhados na perfeição e com uma banda sonora em 8-bits. Corra, salte e nade através de CINCO enormes mundos com nove níveis cada um. Domine lutas com bosses brutais e descubra muitos segredos no mundo de Bloo Kid 2. Após salvar a sua namorada das mãos do terrível feiticeiro, Bloo Kid e Pink Girl desfrutam da vida com o recém-nascido “Pink Kid”. Mas do nada, uma nova aventura começa do nada... Destaques do Bloo Kid 2: - cinco mundos com nove níveis cada um - gráficos em pixel coloridos e feitos à mão - uma banda sonora 8-bits completa - batalhas com bosses épicos - toneladas de segredos

RU.name: Bloo Kid 2
RU.description: Bloo Kid 2 – это классический 2Д ретро-платформер с симпатичной пиксельной графикой и настоящим восьмибитным саундтреком. Бегайте, прыгайте и плывите к своей цели по ПЯТИ мирам, каждый из которых состоит из 9 уровней. Станьте победителем в брутальных схватках с боссами и находите множество секретов в мире Bloo Kid 2. Вызволив свою девушку из лап коварного злого волшебника, Блю Кид (Синий Парень) с Пинк Гёрл (Розовой Девчушкой) наслаждаются жизнью и растят новорожденного Пинк Кида (Розового Парня). И тут внезапно начинается новое и захватывающее приключение... Характерные черты игры Bloo Kid 2: 5 миров, в каждом из которых 9 уровней, Пиксельная графика, созданная вручную Настоящий восьмибитный саундтрек Эпичные битвы с боссами Тонны секретов повсюду
